```{r, message = FALSE}
library(Lahman)
library(tidyverse)
```

```{r}
data <- Batting %>%
  filter(AB > 0) %>%
  anti_join(Pitching, by = 'playerID') %>%
  group_by(playerID) %>%
  summarize(H = sum(H), AB = sum(AB)) %>%
  mutate(average = H / AB) %>%
  inner_join(Master %>%
               select(playerID, nameFirst, nameLast) %>%
               unite(name, nameFirst, nameLast, sep = ' '),
             by = 'playerID') %>%
  select(name, H, AB, average)
```

## Who are the “best” battors?

```{r}
data %>%
  arrange(desc(average)) %>%
  head(10)
```

## Who are the “worst” battors?

```{r}
data %>%
  arrange(average) %>%
  head(10)
```
